
```{r}
library(glmnet)

df = rio::import("./trabalho_final/happines_idx/2018.csv")
names(df)
```

```{r}
#  Regress√£o simples
lm(`Overall rank` ~ `GDP per capita`, data = df)
```


```{r}
#  Lasso
Y = df$`Score`
X = df[, c("GDP per capita", "Freedom to make life choices", "Overall rank")]

cv = cv.glmnet(X, Y, nfolds = length(Y), alpha = 1)
coef(cv, s = "lambda.min")
```
